abstract: The new version of Apple’s video-editing program, iMovie ’09, is far more usable than the previous version — with one major caveat.
snippet: The new version of Apple’s video-editing program, iMovie ’09, is far more usable than the previous version — with one major caveat.
lead_paragraph: I've always been an iMovie nut. This humble video-editing program from Apple, in its way, launched my entire career of making weekly goofball tech videos. For three years, I made them all by myself, on the cheap, with a camcorder and iMovie.

headline.main: Apple Recasts iMovie With Improved Features
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
